protocol.name: P-MTAB-18454
protocol.text: Signal values were normalized using the gcRMA method with Bioconductor package in R. All of the resulting FGEM file is represented in a log2-scale.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-18455
protocol.text: Plants were grown for 7 days (2 days of germination, 5 days of growth) vertically under continuous light conditions at 21ﾰC with 1x Murashige and Skoog medium (4.302 g/L), 10 g/L sucrose, 0.1 g/L myo-inositol, 0.5 g/L MES, 100 uL thiamine hydrochloride (10 mg/mL), 100 uL pyridoxine (5 mg/mL), 100 uL nicotinic acid (5 mg/mL), pH 5.7 adjusted with 1 M KOH, 10 g/L agar. Seeds were put out on a nylon mesh (20 um pore size) (Prosep). (Parameters: start time = 5, time unit = days, min temperature = 21, temperature unit = C)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-18456
protocol.text: Membranes were transferred to 1xMS control medium for the designated amount of time (0h, 5h, 24h)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-18457
protocol.text: Root tips were cut and preserved at -70ﾰC. After grinding of the samples, RNA was extracted with Trizol reagent and purified with RNeasy kit (Qiagen). (Parameters: Extracted product = total_RNA, Amplification = none)
